FuncDef:
The bind slot command binds the tunnel board with the LNS backup group.
The undo bind slot command unbinds the tunnel board from the LNS backup group.
By default, no tunnel board is bound to any LNS backup group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of the tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: You can configure multiple tunnel boards and specify the tunnel boards used by an LNS group. Multiple tunnel boards can be bound to an LNS group. These tunnel boards bear the load in turn based on tunnels.
